Portfolio

About

Hi, I'm Martin

I like to think of myself as a blend between an engineer and a designer. Besides being passionate about my profession and technical background, I find creativity in the workplace to be the best way to provide solutions to challenging problems. It is no coincidence that I find pleasure in graphic design, drawing and music. I practice football on a weekly basis and I love mountain hiking and climbing.

Industrial Process Simulator

Implementation of an industrial process simulator from chemical and physical equations. Design of a modular programming framework to allow block reutilization. Validation of models with real-world data from the nitrate plant.

  • Client: Nitratos Austin S.A.
  • Date: June 2016
  • Service: Software Development

Pellet Extruder

Design of 8 process view panels for tactile HMI. Programming of control logic & operator workplace interface. Optimization of client/server & control network.

  • Client: Petroquimica Cuyo S.A.
  • Date: November 2015
  • Service: Process Automation

Asphalt Plant

Interaction with YPF engineers and operators to determine the best automation solution. Successful proposal of hardware improvements not considered in the commercial offer. Design and supervision of layouts and connection diagrams for 9 control cabinets. Network architecture design and setup (PROFIBUS, Modulebus and virtualized servers). Design of 15 workplace panels based on P&IDs and surveys conducted in the asphalt plant. Implementation of path finding algorithm in real time integrated with Batch Management. Fist project in Latin America to use System 800xA 6.0 along with Batch Management.

  • Client: YPF La Plata
  • Date: August 2015
  • Service: Process Automation

Pos Assembly And Repair Line

Technical and financial product evaluation. Supervision of assembly line and repairing laboratory (in charge of technical staff). Organization of production and inventory.

  • Client: Quantum Technology
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Project Management

Mini Bhs Assembly Line

Technical feasibility analysis. Organization of work using Gantt Diagram. Production rate estimation for resource planning. Negotiation with local and international suppliers.

  • Client: Telefonica S.A.
  • Date: May 2015
  • Service: Project Management

Statheros : 3 Axis Camera Stabilizer

Statheros is a 3-axis camera stabilizer which uses brushless DC motors to compensate disturbances in inclination due to the shaky movement of the cameraman. Its main area of application is in the film industry, aiming to replace the outdated Steadicam technology with its compact form-factor, lightweight design and intuitive user interface.

  • Client: ITBA
  • Date: March 2014
  • Service: Consumer Electronics
